thread.title: Dunkin' Donuts Discontinuing Coffee Coolatta Food
thread.title_full: Dunkin' Donuts Discontinuing Coffee Coolatta | POPSUGAR Food

author: Victoria Messina
title: Dunkin' Donuts Discontinuing Coffee Coolatta Food
text:
A post shared by Dj Phatâ„¢ (@phatphood) on Mar 14, 2017 at 8:32am PDT
Much to the dismay of sugar addicts everywhere, Dunkin' Donuts will be discontinuing its Coffee Coolatta this Summer. The chain announced that it's replacing the calorie-packed beverage with its new Frozen Coffee, a blended drink that combines coffee extract, sugar, and dairy. At a recent media event held at Dunkin' Brands' headquarters, company executives explained how the Coffee Coolatta is more of a dessert, as it's packed with sugar and calories, whereas the Frozen Coffee will hopefully appeal to guests looking for "a more authentic, energizing coffee drinking experience," according to Business Insider .
Coolatta fans who have been sipping on the menu staple since its inception in 1994 aren't taking the news too well, and many of them have shared their dismays on social media (some of which are slightly more dramatic than others).
Omg @DunkinDonuts why would you ever discontinue the coffee coolatta?! I'm disappointed ðŸ˜”

The coffee coolatta is the greatest invention of the 90's. Crazy. I'm legit crying ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­ #SaveTheCoffeeCoolatta

" @DunkinDonuts will say goodbye to its frozen coffee Coolatta " #RIP pic.twitter.com/WvxCunPIr2

Will you miss the Coolatta? Yes! It was the best of the '90s. Share Your Vote: Nope. I'm glad to see it go! Share Your Vote:
